message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation each round.
I'll take a bit more since you're losing value each round
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money fast. Meet me in the middle or this will be a long game.
You're losing value, I'm not. My patience is worth something.
Bob, my friend, let's be reasonable. This offer is more than fair considering the inflation.  Take it before it shrinks even further!
Each round is costing you, not me. Time to be realistic about the value.
